summary: I listened to an interview with the Swedish artist Per Gessle, best known for his work with the band Roxette.  When asked what the key to success is, he replied:
title: Dare to Fail

summary: I think it’s pretty great.  Also, this is a tricky book for make a cover for.  It has a wild premise, a rotating cast of characters, and other structural weirdness that makes it challenging to nail down the vibe...
title: And Now, the Cover to “When the Moon Hits Your Eye”
